short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Komodo Wallet is a secure wallet and non-custodial decentralized exchange rolled into one application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Komodo Mobile offers the widest permissionless cross-chain trading support of any mobile crypto app on the market.

Itâ€™s a fast and secure multi-coin wallet (non-custodial) with peer-to-peer (P2P) DEX support, designed for ease of use and perfect for storing digital assets.

The app provides a secure and easy way to buy and store multiple cryptocurrencies. It supports dozens of the most popular blockchain protocols and hundreds of coins natively.

Learn more about Komodo Mobile Crypto Wallet and find the other versions of this app (desktop wallet and web wallet) on our official website: https://komodoplatform.com
